name: CreateGoalSupportingRelationship
description:
Add a supporting resource to a specific goal in Asana.

Use this tool to create a relationship between a goal and a supporting resource in Asana by specifying the goal ID. This tool is useful when you need to associate additional resources with an existing goal.

parameters.name: goal_global_identifier
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the goal to which a supporting resource will be added.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the goal.

parameters.name: include_optional_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of optional resource properties to include in the response.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: supporting_resource_id
parameters.description: The GID of the supporting resource to add to the parent goal. It must be the GID of a goal, project, task, or portfolio.

value_schema.description: The gid of the supporting resource to add to the parent goal. Must be the gid of a goal, project, task, or portfolio.

parameters.name: insert_subgoal_before_id
parameters.description: The ID of an existing subgoal. The new subgoal will be placed before this subgoal. Cannot be used with `insert_after_subgoal_id`. Only for adding subgoals.

value_schema.description: An id of a subgoal of this parent goal. The new subgoal will be added before the one specified here. `insert_before` and `insert_after` parameters cannot both be specified. Currently only supported when adding a subgoal.

parameters.name: insert_after_subgoal_id
parameters.description: ID of the subgoal to insert the new subgoal after. Cannot use with `insert_before`. Only for subgoal addition.

value_schema.description: An id of a subgoal of this parent goal. The new subgoal will be added after the one specified here. `insert_before` and `insert_after` parameters cannot both be specified. Currently only supported when adding a subgoal.

parameters.name: supporting_goal_contribution_weight
parameters.description: A number between 0 and 1 indicating the supporting goal's contribution to the parent goal's progress. Defaults to 0.

value_schema.description:
Defines how much the supporting goal’s progress contributes to the parent goal’s overall progress. When used with automatically calculated [Goal Metrics](/reference/creategoalmetric) (such as `progress_source = subgoal_progress`), this value must be greater than 0 for the subgoal to count toward the parent goal’s progress.
Accepts a number between 0 and 1 (inclusive). Defaults to `0`.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Enable to receive the response in a formatted and indented manner for easier readability. Recommended for debugging purposes as it increases response time and size.

value_schema.description:
